enable.label: Enable Web Search
enable.tooltip: When enabled, AI can get the latest information through web search

debug.currentProvider: Debug Info: Current provider ({{provider}}) API key: {{status}}

tavily.text: Tavily is a search API designed for AI, providing high-quality search results. Now using a mobile-compatible SDK that completely avoids CORS limitations. Visit

exa.text: Exa is a neural network-based search engine that provides semantic search. Visit

bocha.text: Bocha is an AI-powered search engine that provides intelligent search results. Visit

bingFree.text: Free search service, no API key required. You can choose different search engines to get search results, including Bing, Google, Baidu, Sogou, etc. Uses capacitor-cors-bypass-enhanced plugin to solve mobile CORS issues.

firecrawl.text: Firecrawl provides powerful web scraping and search capabilities. Visit

maxResults.label: Maximum Results: {{count}}
maxResults.description: Adjust the maximum number of search results returned

searchWithTime.label: Add current date to search query

aiIntentAnalysis.label: AI Intent Analysis
aiIntentAnalysis.description: Configure AI intent analysis model for more accurate search keyword extraction

tavily.title: üöÄ Tavily Best Practices Settings
tavily.description: These settings are based on Tavily's official best practices and can significantly improve search quality and relevance.

smartSearch.label: Enable Smart Search
smartSearch.tooltip: Automatically apply best practice settings, including advanced search depth, content chunk optimization, etc.

chunksPerSource.label: Content Chunks per Source: {{count}}
chunksPerSource.description: Number of content chunks per source

minScore.label: Minimum Relevance Score: {{score}}%
minScore.description: Filter out search results with relevance scores below this threshold

newsSearchDays.label: News Search Day Range: {{days}} days
newsSearchDays.description: Used when search topic is set to "News"

includeRawContent.label: Include Raw Content
includeRawContent.tooltip: Get complete webpage content for deep analysis

includeAnswer.label: Include AI Answer Summary
includeAnswer.tooltip: Tavily-generated answer summary based on search results

enableQueryValidation.label: Enable Query Validation
enableQueryValidation.tooltip: Validate query length and format, provide optimization suggestions

enablePostProcessing.label: Enable Result Post-Processing
enablePostProcessing.tooltip: Filter and sort search results based on relevance scores

excludeDomains.label: Exclude Domains (One per line)
excludeDomains.description: These domains will be excluded from search results
